solution_line_template: Alvin needs to harvest {money_needed}/{price_per_coconut}= <<{money_needed}/{price_per_coconut}={coconuts_needed}>>{coconuts_needed} coconuts to earn ${money_needed}.
Therefore, the total number of trees that he has to harvest is {coconuts_needed}/{coconuts_per_tree}= <<{coconuts_needed}/{coconuts_per_tree}={trees_to_harvest}>>{trees_to_harvest}.
